short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts tweets to be un-parse-able by machines. By FT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you tweet on twitter.com, your tweets will be converted to images. Right click to copy the image and paste it as message. This makes it hard for machines to parse your message.
Open source, improvements are welcome. https://github.com/fyyyyy/un-parse-able
